name: Enough is Enough
description:
Enough is enough is a super-addictive and very, very hard platformer game. It may be possibly the world's hardest platformer game.

The progressive difficulty curve of the game and its additive smooth movement mechanics will guaranty endless replicability.

Use the WASD or arrow keys to guide your character over traps like spikes and giant saws to get to the end of the level. Sounds easy? Any mistake results in instant death, sending you back to the beginning of the level.

When you decide that Enough is Enough and you press the "Enough is Enough" button you get rewarded with an evaluation of your skills as a gamer.

Game Features

  • Smooth Game Controls
  • Smooth platforming mechanics
  • Progressively Merciless difficulty
  • 50 hand crafted Levels
  • Gamers Skill evaluation

Each level gets progressively more and more difficult until the game get mercilessly difficult. Don't be afraid though we have included small break sections were you can relax and gather your energy while getting introduced to the new elements of the game. Every level hand crafted and thoroughly tested to insure the level can be bitten.
